00002 /**
00003  * @file ntrxtypes.h
00004  * @date 2007-Dez-11

00007  * @brief Type definitions for data types.
00008  *
00009  * @note BuildNumber = "BuildNumber : 7951";
00010  *
00011  * @note This file contains the generic datatype definitions of the nTRX driver.
00012  *    These type definitions isolate the nTRX code from dependencies on the
00013  *    hardware environment for which the nTRX is compiled.
00014  *
00015  * $Revision: 7037 $

00019  */
00020 /*
00021  * $Log$
00022  */
00023 #include <config.h>
00024 
00025 #ifndef _NTRXTYPES_H
00026 #define _NTRXTYPES_H
00027 #include <stdint.h>
00028 #define BITS2BYTES(n)   (n/8)       /* calc. bits into bytes */
00029 
00030 #ifndef NULL
00031 #define NULL    (0)
00032 #endif  /* NULL */
00033 
00034 #ifndef NIL
00035 #define NIL (0)
00036 #endif  /* NIL */
00037 
00038 #ifdef __cplusplus
00039 extern "C" {
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 
00043 #ifdef  TRUE
00044 #   undef   TRUE
00045 #endif  /* TRUE */
00046 #ifdef  FALSE
00047 #   undef   FALSE
00048 #endif  /* FALSE */
00049 
00050 /** @brief Bool type. */
00051 typedef enum    {
00052     FALSE = 0,
00053     TRUE = 1
00054 }   bool_t;
00055 /** @brief 48 bit address type. */
00056 typedef uint8_t AddrT[6];
00057 
00058 
00059 /**
00060  * @brief General purpose message structure.
00061  *
00062  * This general purpose message structure is used for all
00063  * layer to layer communication.
00064  */
00065 typedef struct
00066 {
00067     uint8_t prim;           /**< The primitive of the message. */
00068     AddrT  addr;            /**< MAC address of the message. */
00069     uint8_t len;            /**< Payload length. */
00070     uint8_t *pdu;           /**< Auxiliary pointer into payload (use for protocol interleaving).*/
00071     uint8_t data[CONFIG_MAX_PACKET_SIZE];/**< Payload of the message. */
00072 
00073     uint8_t status;         /**< Status value for confirmations */
00074     uint16_t value;         /**< Configuration value of a layer setting */
00075     uint8_t attribute;
00076 #   ifdef CONFIG_NTRX_SNIFFER
00077     uint32_t count;     /**< Sniffer stuff */
00078     AddrT  rxAddr;          /**< MAC address of the recipient */
00079     uint8_t frameType;      /**< Frame type of the message */
00080     uint8_t extBits;        /**< Extended bits in the header for ranging */
00081 #   endif /* CONFIG_NTRX_SNIFFER */
00082 } MsgT;
00083 
00084 
00085 /**
00086  * @brief Function pointer type for upstream callback functions.
00087  * @param msg The received message that will be delivered upstream.
00088 */
00089 typedef void (*callbackfn_t)(MsgT *msg);
00090 
00091 
00092 /**
00093  * @brief Timer structure used by the timerlib.
00094  *
00095  * This structure is equal to the clib timer structure.
00096  */
00097 typedef struct
00098 {
00099     int16_t tm_sec;
00100     int16_t tm_min;
00101     int16_t tm_hour;
00102     int16_t tm_mday;
00103     int16_t tm_mon;
00104     int16_t tm_year;
00105     int16_t tm_wday;
00106     int16_t tm_yday;
00107     int16_t tm_isdst;
00108 }   MyTmT;
00109 
00110 
00111 #ifdef __cplusplus
00112 }
00113 #endif
00114 
00115 #endif  /* _NTRXTYPES_H */
